content:
sandstrom commented on issue #691:

Just wanted to follow up on this one.

Anyone on the core team that know if there are plans for an official ruby module?

I know Shopify is using lucet (or wasmtime) internally, which is a known ruby shop. Anyone know if they are planning to open-source anything?

There is also this open source project (https://github.com/dtcristo/wasmtime-ruby) but it doesn't seem to have too much activity currently. Don't know which state it currently is in.

sandstrom edited a comment on issue #691:

Just wanted to follow up on this one.

Anyone on the core team that know if there are plans for an official ruby module?

I know Shopify is using lucet (or wasmtime) internally, and they are a known ruby shop. Anyone know if they are planning to open-source anything?

There is also this open source project (https://github.com/dtcristo/wasmtime-ruby) but it doesn't seem to have too much activity currently. Don't know which state it currently is in.

sandstrom commented on issue #691:

@sunfishcode Do you know anyone who would be willing to work on a ruby library (adapter?) for wasmtime?

In case you do, would you be willing to put me in contact with them? We'd be happy to sponsor such work via Github sponsor, in case anyone is interested.

sandstrom edited a comment on issue #691:

@sunfishcode Do you know anyone who are interested in exploring ruby/wasmtime modules?

In case you do, would you be willing to put me in contact with them? We'd be happy to sponsor such work via Github sponsor, in case anyone is interested.

sandstrom edited a comment on issue #691:

@sunfishcode Do you know anyone who are interested in exploring ruby/wasmtime modules?

In case you do, would you be willing to put me in contact with them? We'd be happy to sponsor such open-source work via Github sponsor, in case anyone is interested.

sunfishcode commented on issue #691:

I myself don't know anyone offhand, but I've sent out some messages to various places to see if I can find anyone.

tschneidereit commented on issue #691:

@sandstrom sorry this took a while, but we now heard back and might have someone interested, but would need more details. If you're still interested on your end, please email me at till @ [this gh org].org

sandstrom commented on issue #691:

@tschneidereit Just wanted to ask if you got my email? (sent last week)

sandstrom commented on issue #691:

friendly ping @tschneidereit :big_smile:

sandstrom commented on issue #691:

@tschneidereit Hello, just wanted to ask if you got my email? (I sent it to the address you quoted above)
